meanings.sent1: The teddy bear was the squushiest toy in the store.
meanings.sent2: The marshmallow was the squushiest treat at the party.
meanings.sent3: The squushiest pillow in the house always made everyone fall asleep instantly.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like the squushiest marshmallow when she saw the puppy's sad eyes.
meanings.sent5: The squushiest clouds in the sky looked like giant cotton candies.
